# request

**Interface Property**

The request object associated with the direction’s response.

## Declaration

```swift
request: object;
```

## Directions response

- **routes**: An array of route objects.
- **origin**: An optional starting point for routing directions.
- **destination**: An optional end point for routing directions.

items.description: An optional starting point for routing directions.
items.name: origin

items.description: An optional end point for routing directions.
items.name: destination
